name: Jose oquendo
text: Terrible customer service. Beware truckers they don’t drive in the TA back lot. Even when there is no sign not letting cars back here. I wish I had not tipped when placing order because not earning my tip one bit. Apparently it is not safe …More

name: David Coager
text: A very nice place to eat the pizza is delicious

name: Justin Cooper
text: Picked contactless curbside, hit the "I"m here button" in the app, no response. Called, no one picks up. Walk in and my pizza is ready, but none of the employees are wearing facial masks during a pandemic. Won't be back.

name: Meagan Kennedy
text: I'd have to agree with another review here; 9 out of 10 times your order will be screwed up. So far I've noticed it's on the weekends, which makes sense. It's busy on the weekends and probably short staffed. I ordered fries for the first …More

name: Atewah Fyffe
text:
I dont know which drug addict they hire to take orders ,but it is not cool to mess up peoples dilivery order and then lie about the driver was outside waiting with the new order you messed up .......
VERY UNPROFESSIONAL

name: Jon Jenkins
text: Kat was Super nice and professional when I placed my order. As a OTR Truck driver that means alot.

name: Joseph Marcoux
text: 6 out of 10 times you’re going to get the wrong order handed to you when you do carry out. Usually, the other 4 times, they’re going to screw up your actual order and make the wrong crust, use no sauce on the pizza, etc. Not a bad place if you just eat there

name: Adam Birch
text: I'm not a big Pizza Hut fan. If I always had it my way I would go anywhere else. Alas, that's not how life is and this this review. …More

text:
Absolutely HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!
normally this place is pretty good with service but not last night! Whatever staff was on duty were terrible! The waitress was horrible, the cook was horrible …More

text: Good service. Clean restaurant.  Very good buffet.

name: Clarence Holcombe

name: E
text: This was an awesome experience which started from my online order right until the time of pick up. Tracy was exceptionally wonderful and very friendly and helpful.

name: Lori Seeley
text: I love this Pizza Hut! Its always clean and the waitressis great!

text: Pizza Hut in gloverville is great because they have this lady Roberta working there and she creates such a warm environment and the service is great as well as the food too

name: Tuyền Vũ
text: Poor customer service. Rude employees. They spoke with rude tone and refused to talk to us as soon as they realize the one on the phone was Asian.

text: The buffet was excellent and hot...

name: Cindy Loucks
text: Very nice salad bar was fresh waitress was very kind

name: Eric Sleezer
text: Great waitress, Nikki.  But food was prepared  elsewhere and heated up in aluminum trays and served like that.  Wings were great buy pasta def not

name: Madigan Miner-Vargas
text: Pretty good service.  Great food. Clean environment.  Nice staff. Very cold! Was a 60* day and they had the a.c. on!

name: Jeremy Francis
text: Rude customer service. Spoke to me like I was a child. Manager forced me off the phone after realizing I was from the FMCC dorms. Staff needs to be under investigation.

name: Darcy Dingman
text: Love to stop in on Saturdays for the buffet and the server there is absolutely wonderful. Can't ask for a better deal.

name: Autumn Mann
text: Horrible service. The waitress looked at our table saw my cup empty asked for another she just walks away! Very rude! Hygiene should be huge! She smelt awful!

name: Christina Doak
text: First time in a long time going to Johnstown site but I was very impressed. Food was done on time and I was greeted by 3 staff members. They were very pleasant and I was serviced fast. Food was great!

name: Marissa L
text: Do guys want business or no?! They have the worst management team/employees that have ever worked in fast food. It’s honestly absurd. They should just go out of business already, it’s not even worth 1 star. If I could I’d give them a -10 rating, I literally would.

name: George Ahrens III
text: Good as always, Roberta is great and Katie is a good manager she's fun to talk with

name: George Carter
text: For a commercial chain pizza restaurant. Pizza Hut Stuffed Crust Pizza is my favorite pizza hands down.

name: Tammy Pepper
text: Not happy with itthe kitchen staff swore a lot the food was cold

name: Shannon Sweet
text: Management is excellent Kate is by far excellent at her job and is recognized by many for her continued hospitality. Food is excellent  and service is excellent great job!!!!!

name: Roger Blanchard
text: Very good pizza very good service

name: Cindy Birch
text: Our server was new to the restaurant and did an excellent job! She was very polite and happy to be serving us! By far, the best service and experience I've had at any pizza hut in a LONG time!

name: Kyle Wallace
text: Some of the best pizza

name: Joshua Allen
text: Gosh, is there anything good I can say about this place? Well, it seems clean whenever I have gone here, that’s a plus! The only thing good here really is the buffet. I think it’s time that Pizza Hut either does a complete overhaul of their …More

name: Weev Gibs
text: Waited 15 minutes in the dining room only to walk out when we did not get served. There was only one other table with people who came after us. She served them however

name: Bernie Hassfurter
text: Lunch buffet is a good deal for the money and fast service if your in a hurry

name: Jessica Kerzner
text: Great meal.  Parking is weird but that's ok.

name: 070basemetal
text: Just like any other Pizza Hut. This one has a lunch buffet which is what attracted me as I didn't have time to wait. Salad bar, pizza and pasta buffet. I would go again.

name: Jimmy Gortva
text: Great prices love the buffet n garlic sauce the best

name: Joel Cordero
text: Great place for quick lunch love the buffet. friendly service you won't be disappointed

name: Kat Kolowski
text: Love this place. Go here every Friday if we can and we always have the same waitress and she knows our order and so does the manager. For over summer they are open till 11pm!!!! Which is great since my fiance works late and if we want pizza we have somewhere to go.

name: Matthew Vittucci
text: I am trying to lose weight, so pizza is not a great choice for me.  In addition, my wife hates anything with tomato sauce.  Why she married a third generation Italian is another story.  This Pizza Hut has been consistent and offers …More

name: Andrew L'Amoureux
text: Decent buffet, okay for the price.

name: Craig Rinehart
text: It took 15 minutes to get a coffee and soda after we placed the orders and then another 35 minutes to get food.  I don't know why we torture ourselves but our son likes this place.  What makes it double bad is my fiancés cousin is the manager here.  Just shameful.

name: Sharon Michael
text: Pizza lacking tomato sauce.  Very dry. THEY USE one small ladle for entire pizza pie.  More like flat bread than pizza

name: Lanel
text: PIZZA!!! Their lunch buffet is good and the waitress is Really nice

text: Food was fresh, priced right, wait staff was polite.

name: Diana Marshall
text: This was the worst order I have ever gotten!! I ordered a mushroom and extra cheese and I think they forgot both of them!!! I got the cheese stuffed garlic bites and they were so over cooked that the cheese was gone!! Disgusting!!! Never again!!

text: Food pretty good and friendly service

text: Made some pizzas vegan by getting without any cheese. Nothing special... needed food.

text: Good for the price

text: Poor management, dirty staff they don't seem to care at all about the restaurant. Unfortunate

name: Bryn Brown
text: Service was good but food was disappointing. I don't think it's the prep, I think it's the business model. Pizza Hut just isn't what it was years ago.

name: Drew Kayhart
text: I ordered some food and came to pick it up.  I set the pickup time for 6:15. I showed up on time and a half hour later I got my food.  The restaurant was empty, and I could see why.  The employees were unprofessional, and down right rude.  I suggest never going there!

name: 92ext
text: last week, they were out of large pizza boxes. this week, they are now out of the pizza pans to make pan pizza's!?!?!? what the hell! its almost like one time i went to a papa johns and they said they were out of pizza dough (yeah, that actually happened!)!!!

text: The Pizza was real doughy. But we got $7 taken off our bill because of it. But all the same, it was doughy.
